CHILDHOOD:
Jamieson had a pretty nice childhood.
He grew up in Kitchener Canada. He has a younger sister and spent his childhood summers playing on the beach of Lake Huron in a town called Kincardine. Btw if you ever want to chat about something else, just say 'done'. %[I want more details about his family](postback:childhood_family)
I WANT MORE DETAILS ABOUT HIS FAMILY:
His parents we're married in 1966 and recently celebrated their 50th anniversary.
His sister lives in Toronto and works as a teacher and he has two nieces in Toronto and one in Calgary
EDUCATION:
Jamieson has always been an independent and creative type.
